<div class="margin-bottom-sm line-height-150">
    <h3 class="no-format inline italic-bolder font-20 dark-grey">"This was the first time I have purchased and new car and..."</h3>
    <span class="italic font-18 black notranslate">- cbabyb3</span>
</div>

<!-- REVIEW BODY -->

<div class="tr margin-top-md">
    <div class="td text-left valign-top ">
        <p class="font-16 review-content margin-bottom-none line-height-25">This was the first time I have purchased and new car and they made it so easy and relaxing. I appreciate all they did to make our visit go smoothly. Very friendly and knowledgeable.</p>
            <a id="6575330" class="read-more-toggle pointer line-height-25 small-text block margin-bottom-md">Read More</a>
    </div>
</div>
